"}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Step 05:", "bold": true}, {"text": " Applicants who wish to send their application by post, must send the application form along with application money as mentioned above, and other documents of General Terms & Conditions in the prescribed form, to the following address:- The Managing Director, West Bengal Police Housing & Infrastructure Development Corporation Limited, Araksha Bhawan (3rd Floor), Block-DJ, Sector-II, Salt Lake City, Kolkata- 700091.
